DOC.brief_summary: The investigator hypothesize omega does-dependently improve vascular insulin resistance .
DOC.brief_title: Vascular Metabolic Effects Omega-3 Fatty Acids
DOC.criteria: hypertriglyceridemia overt liver disease , chronic renal failure , hypothyroidism , myopathy , uncontrolled diabetes ( HbA1c > 9 % ) , severe hypertension , stroke , acute coronary event , coronary revascularization within precede 3 month , alcohol abuse
